title: By the King. His Majesties offer of pardon to the rebells now in arms against Him.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: "Given at Our court at Edge-Hill, this 24. day of October, in the eighteenth yeer of Our reign.".
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
